Name: Beeswing
About the game: Beeswing is a game set in a small village in rural Scotland, the village I grew up in, home. Visit the places and people who shaped a life and discover their stories. Represented in hand painted, water colour graphics with a unique, acoustic soundtrack. Features No puzzles or fighting or anything like that. Under 3 hours of content! Stuff you find in your regular day like people who leave their TV on when they have visitors and friends feeling a bit glum! My mum, she's there. Quite a slow movement speed. Old People! Sad bits. and not much more!
Meta Title: Beeswing: May 8, 2015, J. King-Spooner and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Beeswing? Check out the release date (May 8, 2015), developer insights from J. King-Spooner, and a complete game summary.
